title: STSPR TypeScript Config Configuration
description: TypeScript config-level configuration for STSPR tool.

exclude-this-tsconfig.description: Whether to exclude this specific TypeScript configuration from processing. When true, this tsconfig file will be completely ignored by the sync tool: it won't be processed for project references, other packages won't reference this specific tsconfig, and it won't be included in sibling tsconfig references within the same package.

extra-refs.description: Additional TypeScript project references to include for this specific tsconfig. These references will ONLY be added to this particular TypeScript configuration, not to other tsconfig files in the same package.

path.description: Path to the TypeScript configuration file (relative to the directory containing this tsconfig file).

skip-refs.description: TypeScript project references to explicitly skip/exclude for this specific tsconfig. These references will be removed from this particular TypeScript configuration even if they would normally be included through workspace dependencies or package-level config.

path.description: Path to the TypeScript configuration file to skip (relative to the directory containing this tsconfig file).
